subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Sébastien Ogier of France secured his first world rallying title on the opening day of the Rally of France when Thierry Neuville failed to clinch the stage win he needed.
snippet: Sébastien Ogier of France secured his first world rallying title on the opening day of the Rally of France when Thierry Neuville failed to clinch the stage win he needed.
